```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(haven)
library(survey)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data <- read_sav("/Users/zhan039/Desktop/USC_HEAL/CHC_DHS/YZ/CHCs_YZ.sav")
```

```{r}
CHC <- data %>% filter(., !ClinicNetwork %in% "")
```

```{r}

CHC.new <- CHC %>% mutate(., prop = TotalPatients2019/sum(TotalPatients2019))

CHC.new <- CHC.new %>% mutate(., weight = 1/prop)

CHC.new <- CHC.new %>% select(., -prop)
```

```{r}
write_sav(CHC.new, "/Users/zhan039/Desktop/USC_HEAL/CHC_DHS/YZ/CHCs_weight_YZ.sav")
```
